p: The results of the present study show that treatment with PCEO for 13 days induced a significant decrease ( p < 0.05) in the level of MDA in rats at the level of the skin (0.78 Â± 0.18 nmoles of MDA/mg of protein) ( Table 4) and induction of the wound caused an increase in the level of MDA. Treatment did restore this rate, indeed, the MDA level of group (3) and group (4) were lower than that of group (1).
